title: Bīt-Adad-erība
description: A town mentioned in Neo-Assyrian sources that is identified with the modern site of Tell Baqqaq, a ruined settlement mound located ca. 10 km south of Gir-e pan that is now under water.

properties.description: Tell Baqqaq 2, which is now submerged under water, is visible in Corona satellite images. It is located on the south bank of the Baqqaq river, east of Tell Baqqaq 1.
properties.title: Imagery location of Tell Baqqaq 2
